mapper.select:
select ci.id, ci.expert_code, ci.base_id, ci.create_date, ci.`type`, ci.enterprise_code, ei.name as enterpriseName, ei.abbreviation, ei.nature, ed.logo, ei2.name as expertName, ei2.images as expertImages, post_info.post_name, post_info.address, post_info.experience, post_info.responsibility, post_info.academic, post_info.work_time, post_info.work_hour, post_info.work_address, post_info.work_require, post_info.salary, post_info.welfare from collect_info ci left join enterprise_info ei on (ei.id = ci.enterprise_id) left join enterprise_detail ed on (ed.enterprise_id = ei.id) left join expert_info ei2 on (ei2.code = ci.expert_code) left join post_info on (post_info.id = ci.base_id) where 1 = 1
AND ei.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.enterpriseName},'%')
AND ei.abbreviation LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.abbreviation},'%')
AND ei2.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.expertName},'%')
AND ei2.user_id = #{collectInfo.expertId}
order by ci.create_date desc
